website_summaries.verdict: A rugged machine with lots of extras to maximize your workout efforts, making it a close contender for the best.
pros: Offers many workout options, as it has 99 speed settings, 3 movement patterns, and 5 programs
Access to online training, the company's certified fitness professional, and fitness ebooks assists you in achieving your goals
cons: There's a learning curve to mastering its many functions
The platform is heavy and on the large side compared to similarly structured models
Most expensive option on our list

customer_reviews.title: It really does work!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after I saw a similar one on TV, but as I was looking through the different machines on Amazon, and read the ratings, I realized this is the one I needed to get. I use it several times a day, and as a now homeworker glued to a computer all day long, this is my relief. It is my exercise, and it is my pain control, as I have lots of arthritis. This is my savior!
customer_reviews.author: B. BENEDIK

customer_reviews.title: Quality Vibration Plate at a Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: I initially started researching vibration plates based on a recommendation from a massage therapist who works on my back issues and sciatica. I spent a few weeks researching plates and determined the Lifepro 3D Turbo plate was the model I needed. Since I started using it I have experienced some back pain relief for periods of time. I have also had two friends buy the same model after trying mine. Thanks LifePro!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Quality product without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to help "get me going in the morning" and to help unwind at the end of the day. I do belief it has helped relieve some neuropathy issues I've had in my leg. It is well built and is much more affordable than some products on the market--and it doesn't take a lot of space! I have had some issues with the remote control. It doesn't seem to work any longer and that's unfortunate. Any insight on that?
customer_reviews.author: S. Holeman

customer_reviews.title: If you’ve been sedentary, START HERE FIRST!
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed fully deconditioned last year at the age of 30 due to trauma. This machine is the game changer I needed. I am unable to benefit from a full workout because it is so painful and I’m so weak. Simply standing on this in a super woman’s pose while deep breathing has helped my tight rigid core loosen up. I finally feel blood flow in my lower extremities and color in my feet. I am so ecstatic that this is my machine and will aid me in a full recovery in strength!
customer_reviews.author: Instagram- @transforming_me702

customer_reviews.title: Spend another 100 and get the 4D rumblex, 100x better
customer_reviews.text: Ok. I tried a friend 4D and was blown away at his brand which isn't available. The intensity was insane in a good way. I was disappointed in this as it wasn't a fraction of the intensity so I returned and bought the 4D rumblex. Wow if you are ok to say run 50 feet and don't have some health issue.. pay the extra $100 and buy the rumblex. Hate to give it a average review, but turbo 3D wasn't for me. Love the 4D rumblex. It's all the plates in one... My whole family uses it including our daughter who dances on company and is shredded...
customer_reviews.author: T. Stickel

customer_reviews.title: So helpful for regaining body strength
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed was my digestion was helped while using this. And I love how i can feel the vibration all up my back, loosening my hips, & getting to areas that I usually hope my massage therapist gets to. I use it several times throughout the day, including times when I’ll lay my hands on it to plank (kinda) for a few minutes. It’s helping me feel like I can get some exercise in, as I find it difficult to move and bend like I used to. I am very happy with my purchase, and regret not getting this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Joann Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Effective, easy to use, well supported
customer_reviews.text: The quarantine badly impacted my exercise program, and I was losing my conditioning. At 79 years old, I couldn't afford to let that happen. I just got the Lifepro a week ago, and I've used it four times. I already feel my energy coming back. I can watch TV while I use it, and I plan to use it every day. This is a great product, and really well supported! Every question I've asked has been answered very quickly by e-mail.
customer_reviews.author: bluewaternut

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product and Company!!
customer_reviews.text: Do to the virus I am now working at home and sitting way too much to do my job. After I received and started using the Turbo Platform I noticed I was sleeping better at night. I love how it makes my overall body feel after time spent "onboard". I am looking forward to learning more and more about how it can and will benefit my body! This is a quality product. The customer service support and helpful videos are an additional indication of the quality of the company. I highly recommended the product and company.
customer_reviews.author: D. B.

customer_reviews.title: Helping me with RLS
customer_reviews.text: I have restless leg syndrome so I was looking to purchase a product that would help the circulation in my legs which should help me with mitigating the intensity of the restless legs. So far it has slightly improved after a week. Also, the added bonus to my exercises such as planks and abs while standing is awesome! I use this product every day for a minimum of 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jony M

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Really helps my spine. Standing helps my lower back. Leaning forward on hands loosens stiff neck. I know there are more settings I need to explore. The only reason 4 stars on ease of use is because I have to read thru book to find out how to use more settings -- which could probably be more obvious with a few additional buttons on remote. EDIT: from 5 stars to 4 stars because the manual really needs help. Device is great, but instructions need serious help.
customer_reviews.author: kbay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using the plate. I use it almost everyday. Never had a problem with joint pain but I am noticing toning up in my legs. I have been feeling sick maybe from changing weather where I had a headache or feeling sick and got on the plate for 20 minutes and pain went away. That kind of blew me away. So I’m very greatful for that. I would definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.author: nsells28

customer_reviews.title: So far SO GOOD! SOLID, HEAVY-DUTY PLATFORM!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I feel better circulation, less tension in my neck and lower back. My husband also loves it, he says he feels a deeper muscular workout. Thank you for creating a solid platform that is yet still affordable. The first-time I ever hopped on a vibrating platform was at an Osteo Strong gym. It was exhilarating but theirs was much larger, commercial-grade, this platform is SOLID, commercial-grad in my opinion but compact and affordable. I would highly recommend this but caution anyone beginning on low for the first week and gradually increasing to med then high.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGurl

customer_reviews.title: Resistance bands do not have anything to clip onto metal rings
customer_reviews.text: It has been a while purchasing this. Today for the first time I wanted to use the resistance bands and they do not have any hook to clip them on the lifepro turbo (see the photo). I am so disappointed. Other than that I enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmet Safak

customer_reviews.title: You need this asap! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing! I've struggled with back pain for almost 15 yrs after pulling a muscle. I've been on all kinds of pain meds & muscle relaxers. I've had countless physical therapy appointments and expensive massages and they only provided temporary relief. In less than 1 wk the daily pain & strain was almost completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to set up and understand the directions how to operate. It does take a minute the first time you step on it to “get the feel” for how to position yourself. When done with 10 minutes or so you feel a little fatigued, which I like. I like the unit. My husband has chronic pain so I’m putting him on it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps strengthen legs which helps lessen knee pain
customer_reviews.text: I use the Turbo Platform for recovery purposes for both of my knees after I play 2 hours of tennis on hard courts. I do the glute & hamstring stretches and finish with a set of slow controlled squats. These exercises help stretch and strengthen my quads, glutes and hamstrings which help lessen my knee pain post playing tennis. The Turbo provides a more intense workout which is done in less time and hits deeper muscles which is excellent for strengthening purposes.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: If I can use this and benefit from it, which I have, I would encourage everyone to try it!
customer_reviews.text: Due to connective tissue damage in my legs I have pain and mobility challenges. I'm still not able to sustain an entire 10-minute workout, but I can already notice an increase in strength and mobility and a slight decrease in pain. I've noticed a tremendous amount of improved mood! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara L. Richards

customer_reviews.title: I’m a believer.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time doing an Amazon review. I have had hip pain since I was a teenager. I developed pubic symphysis disfunction during pregnancy that stayed with me after my second child. Chiropractic treatments and Pilates would sometimes help and sometimes make things more unstable. After 3 days of using my Turbo, my hips and pelvis were pain free. I also fee less general stress and am sleeping better. I only wish the Rumblex had been in stock when I ordered. Otherwise, I cannot be more pleased with this therapeutic tool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to continue core exercises that I was doing at physical therapy on their commercial vibration plate. I like it so far. I stay with the balance exercises that I learned at therapy. If I use any of the upper body exercises from the booklet that came with this machine it causes the pain in my neck/shoulders to be worse. I don't believe it is the fault of the machine. I just think I'm not quite ready to do those kind of exercises yet.
customer_reviews.author: td7730

customer_reviews.title: Hoping for help with my Lipedema - so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Turbo for a week now and I'm starting out very slow 20 minutes a day at the lowest program settings. I am enjoying how easy it is to use once I figured out to read the display. It is quieter than I thought it would be but much heavier! Looking forward to ratcheting up on the intensity and incorporating more exercises. I feel like it is a program I can stick to and it will help lymphatic drainage and my lipedema.
customer_reviews.author: Amy LaMere

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I love that my muscles feel fatigued after using the LifePro turbo and I am only using the Program 4 (of 9) setting. My husband is very impressed too and that says a lot. He is a runner and says he will definitely continue using it. I love the fact that it is so quiet and the lifetime guarantee gives me great confidence in the quality of the product. I can see myself using this product as a fitness tool from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifepro is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my Lifepro! It's wonderful for health, posture, strength, and weight. A turbo vibration plate is a must for promoting healthy living. The Lifepro turbo vibration plate is not only quality but user-friendly. So easy to use and easy on the body. Highly recommend it for multiple reasons. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Marie R.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful vibration.
customer_reviews.text: I started out slow as per instructions. As of now, I'm really liking it. Even with minimal effort on my part, my body is burning calories. I sweat for just working on it for 20 minutes. Easily able to store under my bed. So far, I'm really liking it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda P.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy to use and well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I followed advice from users online and started slowly. It was a very pleasant and 'easy' workout. I've been alternating between manual and P1 for a little over a week. The online videos are very informative and helpful! I am a 66 yo breast cancer survivor and use the turbo to increase bone density, improve balance and hopefully, regulate my weight. I really love how easy it is to use! I don't have to go anywhere and can use it throughout the day. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: beckymrd

customer_reviews.title: This is helping me on my journey to a healthier life
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the Turbo Platform to supplement my workout. I'm doing interval training, so during the periods of active rest, I jump to the platform. I am also using it to perform any exercises from my program that are applicable (squats, lunges, even push ups). I'm recovering from a frozen shoulder, so I'm also using the attached exercise bands to work my arms and shoulders. Since I also have Hashimoto's Disease (an autoimmune thyroid disease), I struggle with joint and muscle pain. I believe the Turbo is helping to alleviate that pain. I'm also trying to get down below my BMI, so the Turbo is helping me in my weight loss journey as I implement a healthy, active lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Angie B Rippy

customer_reviews.title: This product makes my legs feel great.
customer_reviews.text: It feels great all over my body, but especially my legs. I use it in the morning before work and it helps energize me. When I get home from work and use it, it helps revive my tired legs. I am a registered nurse and work in a surgery department and am on my feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: Harrison Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief helper
customer_reviews.text: It has definitely been helping my back and joint pains. I am still working through how to really utilize it for working out. But I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and attractive
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the platform for my son who has autism and mild cerebral palsy. He uses it for 5-10 min. several times a week. We think it may be helping decrease spasticity and improve balance -- unclear, but time will tell. He enjoys it. I also use it occasionally as a workout extra. I enjoy it most when my body feels good and I don't feel vulnerable to overdoing it. I have not taken a consistent and scientific approach to its use as yet. Certainly, it is easy to use in our living room and slides under the couch when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief and improved flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Still exploring the different settings, but I feel like it's a good workout with minimal effort. My back pain seems better with improved flexibility. My wife will be using it for hip and gluteus pain relief, as she continues to recover from a previous injury that affected her gait. She also will be using it to improve her balance. She's feeling positive about its ability to help her and is happy with the results, thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D Feldman

customer_reviews.title: BEST INVESTMENT WE'VE MADE IN YEARS!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE EASE OF USE. THE LITERATURE ON THIS WBV PLATFORM STRONGLY SUPPORTS THE MULTIPLE HEALTH BENEFITS. MY WIFE HAS EXPERIENCED A TIGHTENING OF SKIN AFTER LOSING 35# ON AN INTERMITTENT FASTING PLAN. WE LEARNED ABOUT THIS EQUIPMENT ON GIN STEPHENS PODCAST, "INTERMITTENT FASTING STORIES." THE WORD NEEDS TO BE SPREAD ABOUT THE BENEFITS!
customer_reviews.author: V. A. Woodman

customer_reviews.title: Pain
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking it would help loosen my lower back without too much pain. It is very low impact, but if you have back pain from injury like me, this may not be your product. Disappointed, but not in the product. I think it would have worked if I was not already injured.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders! Sounds terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Great for sore joints, as well as a good work out. However, after a couple of weeks of use, I noticed the vibration noise turned into a loud clanking noise. The sound is annoying and too disturbing to use early or late in the day. It definitely will wake anyone sleeping in nearby rooms. It is no longer a relaxing and enjoyable experience. Sad
customer_reviews.author: P. Lanman

customer_reviews.title: Impressive piece of equipment for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have not gotten into a routine with it yet. My mother has used it & believes it has helped her pain & swelling in her foot, she's 93. Purchased for both of us to use. I have some sort of injury & swelling in my foot so I am hoping for improvement in circulation of lymphatic fluids and some fitness benefits. It is much larger than I expected so much more stable but not as easy to move around. It actually is good because I don't want my mother falling, she has been doing it while sitting & placing her feet on it, but hoping to try her standing at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Life saver while working from home
customer_reviews.text: With working from home, I have experienced lower back pain and tightness. Standing on the platform several times a day helps to relieve the pain and tightness. I have only tried a few arm exercises with the bands and could see some change in muscle definition but I have not been consistent as of yet. My family has also used it to loosen up their muscles before and after workouts and absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ktrina S

customer_reviews.title: Encouraged
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really seen results yet but do two different activities on it daily. Sure feels like its working, and gets you encourage to work out more.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Day 3 so far, so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, it’s only been day 3 but I can tell my heart rate increase and can feel it in my core.
customer_reviews.author: Lory Ortiz Torentinos

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: We gave five stars to everything except the remote control. The reason for this is simply we haven’t use the remote control at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifepro Turbo
customer_reviews.text: The Turbo Platform engages my leg muscles and with the 3D platform it is outstanding for stability. I use it twice a day and usually use in on the middle level. My concern is that it would not be powerful enough. That is definitely not a problem. It is extremely well built, sturdy and very powerful. Definitely glad I made the purchase. My only concern is that I possibly should have gone for the 4D. But this is definitely working out great for me. Thanks Turbo.
customer_reviews.author: Al G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It's been 8 days since I started using it. I use it with my family (Husband & my son) for a healthy diet. I have knee pain and low back pain, so I started using this as a treatment. It feels very good. I'm looking forward to the future! This feels better than a jump rope that is good for your knees. I feel that the vibrations reach my ribs and internal organs around my stomach. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kate M.

customer_reviews.title: I love it and recommend to anyone who has a hard time working out because of joint pain.
customer_reviews.text: I love the different preset programs and just holding different poses. I have joint issues, but with my turbo I can actually feel my muscles working without the impact on my joints. After using it, I feel invigorated and refreshed. I usually dread exercise and immediately want to get off the elliptical, but with the life pro plate, I find myself wishing the 10 minute session hadn’t ended! I started out slowly, but I’m building towards doing more sessions, and will be trying some of the online workout videos soon. I love it and recommend to anyone who has a hard time working out because of joint pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for improving balance
customer_reviews.text: I am finding this product helps me with my balance. I am 70 years old and although I don't have a diagnosis of anything specific, I have been finding over the years that I am getting less confident in that department. My naturopath suggested I try the Lifepro and I have to admit I was skeptical but so far there is progress. I will continue using it, that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Horton

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product and Great Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product on a recommendation from Gin Stephens' intermittent fasting website. After reading the website links she included as evidence supporting the health benefits of vibration plates, I decided to purchase. In just a few days of use, I have noticed my muscles don't feel "wound so tightly" as my chiropractor would say. It has made my tight hip flexors loosen up as well. I am looking forward to the other health benefits in the future as well. The LifePro team is also very helpful in sending emails with information on various workouts and tips.
customer_reviews.author: Michele J

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best device I’ve bought in a while. It easy to use and it has helped me with my back problem. I love the speed adjusting buttons and different speeds which makes it fun and easy to reach my goal. Amazing experience so far!
customer_reviews.author: Suddenly

customer_reviews.title: Vibration plate interesting
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bizarre experience. I like it and look forward to getting better at all The programs. I feel stronger and have better balance.
customer_reviews.author: lt tracy

customer_reviews.title: Inflammation nearly gone!
customer_reviews.text: The platform is a game changer for my workouts because I have so much less inflammation after a workout I dont need to sleep all day to recover. I have hashimoto's and this device has immensely helped with inflammation in my body.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Mason

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I love the turbo 3d. I had diastasis recti after having twins and have been working hard trying to close my abdominal gap for over a year. I even did physical therapy, and while I got stronger, the gap really didn't decrease. Within 2 weeks of using the turbo 3d, the gap has gotten significantly smaller.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I used a PowerPlate machine for almost a year at a nearby studio. Due to COVID I'm visiting my parents, WFH and not working out as much so I decided to order LifePro. Walking is great, but I needed something extra. I love it and the price point! The machine is so quiet, too, which is a plus! My dad has also started using it for his arthritis and says it's much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jeay

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my chronic pain & a great workout!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from chronic pain in my lower back (degenerative disc disease and a ruptured disc) and knee, since using the Turbo my pain has decreased significantly. It’s also the coolest workout I’ve ever done! I use this as a warmup and it has made a big impact on the intensity of my workouts as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki W

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It is strong. I love my platform and after 1 month I notice a difference in the cellulite on the back of my thighs as well as a tighter butt. I will keep using because no real effort is required of me.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality device. More powerful than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: My spouse enjoy using it so far, reduces joint pain. With regular workouts she noticed positive results on her thighs. It would be nice to have 30-40 min guided video lessons for workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Sergiy Zuban

customer_reviews.title: Great for pain relief
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are both using it and getting used to it...both sitting down and standing up. He has circulation and lower back problems (due to extensive surgery) and definitely sees an improvement just from a few days. I have not shared such medical issues, and I unpacked machine and set it up. I turned it on, and my legs continued to feel beneficial effects for at least thirty minutes after turning it off. We are using it in our second residence which is a studio apartment, and it neatly stores in a tight space.
customer_reviews.author: DC-Rosslyn commuter

customer_reviews.title: Great for helping couch potatoes up and out!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can do a routine at home and without much fuss! I can definitely feel the effects on my lower body at this time. I wish the remote was more "user friendly", but that's my only complaint. It is really quiet, which was a pleasant surprise!
customer_reviews.author: J.Catherine Herbert

customer_reviews.title: I've only had it a week
customer_reviews.text: My intention is to rebuild some bone loss and I will be working with a PT shortly, who recommended the vibrating plate. My hopes are high. I haven't been able to sit through the lengthy video regarding it's use - just some here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer outreach!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the customer outreach and the many resources they offer. Had questions and they were answered within hours. I like the pre-programs. I found them all very easy to withstand. I just haven’t taken the time to utilize all the bands or any videos. Very solid machine. It’s kinda heavy and so I leave it in the same spot. I ordered because I want to strengthen my core, tone and hopefully lose weight. It’s only been a couple of weeks and I can’t brag on any progress in these three areas...yet.
customer_reviews.author: Vonda J

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used it only to relax my legs, I find the sensation pleasing. I plan to exercise the rest of my body when I get used to it and achieve sufficient balance.
customer_reviews.author: The Scythian

customer_reviews.title: Great Product so far
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the purchase of this product. It has really improved my sense of wellness. I had issues with my knee due to poor circulation, and within a week of use. My knee is feeling better as well as my overall energy level. The vibration almost feels like massage, much better than a Bluefin model that I purchased about a year ago which failed to work properly after 2 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Horton

customer_reviews.title: I think everyone should use this as part of a healthy tissue and exercise program.
customer_reviews.text: I think it's best to start my day with about 10 minutes of vibration to get the blood flowing in my body after a night's sleep. It helps with Ischemia.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Cohen

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE BUT.
customer_reviews.text: I INJURED MY KNEE AND AFTER A WILE IT WAS GETTING WORST, I NOTICE THAT EVERY TIME I USED THE MACHINE MY KNEE PAIN GOT WORST. I RETURN IT.
customer_reviews.author: yovanka flores

customer_reviews.title: Only 10 minutes a day
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever!!! It’s so good for the body and in only 10-15 minutes a day you feel that you worked out so hard. I’m more toned and feel stronger. It also helps you with pain. Very good choice with a lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: Great vibration motion
customer_reviews.text: It’s vibrating the heck out of my body! I’m not sure if it’s working to lose weight but I know my circulation is sure getting amped up!
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Great Results & Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and I already feel more flexible and stronger in the short time I have owned it. I use it twice a day and each time I feel like I have had a vigorous 2 mile walk. My joint pain is less and my muscles are responding by becoming more firm.
customer_reviews.author: CAB in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Works okay, but keep in mind does not help for weight loss, unless you do other exercises. It does help ease pain in body..
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Eases aches
customer_reviews.text: I use it two or three times per day. It helps with stretching, reduces knee aches and seems to make it easier to sleep at night.
customer_reviews.author: CEC

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: My back feels great! And my pain feels better! I really enjoy the fact that it’s not high impact and it’s very enjoyable to do!
customer_reviews.author: JW tucson

customer_reviews.title: Different from any other fitness concept
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I'm getting the most out of this machine, but I do know it has great potential! I want to learn how to maximize the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Roonie

customer_reviews.title: Loving the Lifepro Vibration Plate so far
customer_reviews.text: Me and my wife love using the Lifepro Turbo Platform Black. We are starting out slow and using the first two programs 10 minutes at a time. When you step off the machine, it feels as though you have been working out for much longer. We are looking forward to increasing the intensity and getting all of the benefits described.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Trapp

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Easy to operate and I found the pain I had in my lower back is gone and I have only used the machine for a week. I use program 3 and 5 in the morning, I do squats, pushups and arches while on the machine. Very happy so far and it has only been 7 days that I have the turbo. My husband uses the machine also and finds his knee pain is gone. He is also toning his arms’
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Loud rattle
customer_reviews.text: Works well but it makes an annoying rattle- there is something loose inside it and it makes a loud rattle - works well otherwise
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: I can finally exercise at home
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to use and helps me start the day. I have some medical issues that have prevented me from doing much exercise but this vibrator plate has definitely allowed me to at least have some form of movement that will benefit my body.
customer_reviews.author: Achin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have fibromyalgia and SI joint issues and wasn’t sure if I could tolerate all the vibration, but surprisingly it hasn’t been an issue. Also my body tends to retains a lot of fluids and I really feel it’s helping to rid those fluids. I’m very satisfied with my Turbo.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent therapy vibration platform for venous insufficiency
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Vibrating Platform as circulation therapy for me and my old father. We suffer venous insufficiency and buying this machine is our low impact high perfomance technique to improve our health and drain toxins. Thanks for this excellent product and service.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: So far I like it.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have used if everyday since it arrived and am starting to feel its effects mostly on my knees (which have been bad since basketball injuries 50 years ago). We will see how they do in a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Conkling

customer_reviews.title: Really works and relaxes me!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for 2 cycles of 10 minutes every night. It makes me sleep like a baby. I feel like my sinuses drain and im able to feel much more refreshed in the morning. Finally getting good nights sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Good Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for warm ups
customer_reviews.text: I have server arthritis in both knees and lower leg swelling . I use the lifepro to help circulate and warm up those body parts.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: Available for use all the time am and pm Positive for firmness Sleep well Endurance great
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Recovery Aid
customer_reviews.text: This platform really helps my recovery. I am an active athlete, and it really helps with my muscles and joints.
customer_reviews.author: The Brewers

customer_reviews.title: Pain free for first time in 1 1/2 years
customer_reviews.text: I have sciatica with numbness in my left foot. Since I have used the Turbo Platform (or as I call it "the shaker thing"), my sciatica has improved at least 80%. I can sleep all night without without waking up in pain and I am not in pain in the morning. I love this thing!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Chatman

customer_reviews.title: Great for detoxing, muscle tone, weight loss
customer_reviews.text: I feel by muscle tone is much more evident along with lymphatic system activation and related benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisvac73

customer_reviews.title: Helping with back and leg pain
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use either in the sitting or standing position. Being utilized by a 70 and 53 year old. Even utilizing on the lower setting, had decreased back pain and leg pain from standing at job all day. Slowly moving up to higher settings on machine to build stamina.
customer_reviews.author: Jim and Alan

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job for circulation
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Does the job its intended for. Great for circulation 100%
customer_reviews.author: Elias Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the Turbo Platform for a week. So far I’ve noticed I get better sleep. I was definitely needed more activity during quarantine and this is a great product to get active while staying inside.
customer_reviews.author: Elma M.

customer_reviews.title: great for RLS
customer_reviews.text: I have restless leg syndrome and I use this to help prevent my legs from twitching at night. It has been a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: mark weber

customer_reviews.title: No more water weight!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my life pro I used to hold a lot of water weight but this machine has changed that no more water pill for me and it has only been a week also really like how relaxing it is. I wish I could stand on it all day.
customer_reviews.author: thania I. Walker

customer_reviews.title: It works better than I thought it would!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how much more I tense my muscles when doing things like squats, lunges, or planks using this machine. I didn't expect to have sore muscles, but I did after the first time. I also like that with 10-minute programs, I can easily fit it into my busy day, when longer workouts would be harder to do consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi Quarez

customer_reviews.title: LifeProFitness Vibrating Therapy
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the price of this machine, it's very easy to transport to another room or location and it has an easy to use remote control. There seems to be many different health benefits from using this vibration therapy platform, which ultimately drew me to purchasing it. I look forward to all the benefits that come with using this uniquely designed machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels pretty good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Helps me feel more energized and somewhat just massaged sensation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: I spend long hours sitting on my desk and using this product I've been able to relax some of the tension that comes from such a sedentary lifestyle. 10/10 would recommend to anyone who doesn't have as much time to go out and exercise or that is unable to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your not going to hurt yourself if you go to slow.
customer_reviews.text: I have bad knees so I took it slow and give my knees a little extra vibration, so they can relax after my workout. The other thing is because I have always lifted weights my neck give me first. So if you rest your hands on the platform while on you knees you will feel all the vibration in your arms And neck. I love the results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good way to set and achieve a workout goal
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using my Lifepro Turbo 3D for a week and I look forward to that 15 minute workout everyday. My goal is weight loss and and healthier and more flexible body. I will give an update in a month or two.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie T

customer_reviews.title: It works!  I noticed more energy and less pain within days of use.
customer_reviews.text: I have back issues that are debilitating. Walking is sometimes crippling to me. The muscles that support the back are knotted and overworked. Using the product brought relief to muscles immediately. I also noticed increased health and energy from lymph flow. I love the feeling of hope I now have. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Merrilyn Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Portable wellness
customer_reviews.text: I like that the platform is portable so I can easily move it around the house. Easy to set up and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: robin a

customer_reviews.title: well built
customer_reviews.text: Happy with all aspects of the turbo except the weight. Provides everything the product description promises. Instruction booklet is very well written (unlike others that are written abroad) and easy to follow. Moving it up or down stairs is the only drawback.
customer_reviews.author: bob s.

customer_reviews.title: Great for pain relief and low impact workouts.
customer_reviews.text: My spouse has scoliosis and uses Turbo for relief of back pain which has worked in just 7 days of use. I am 70 years old and very fit for my age. Over the last 7 days, I have used Turbo to enhance my daily workouts (IE: Planks) and love the Turbo as a warm down after working out. I would love to revisit the results in 60 days and share the results.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the many different settings and levels. It is sturdy & stable, so I can do my exercises on it & still feel secure. The remote needs more directions.
customer_reviews.author: SMR

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps with pain, but I'm not so sure about weight loss.
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! My hip and lower back pain is so much better after 10 minutes on this.
customer_reviews.author: Larry A.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my new LifePro!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my LifePro for a week and I love it so far! I am looking forward to getting more familiar and learning each of the different modes. I am hopeful to use it daily and I will come back after some time using. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Evonne Allen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a "power vibe" at my chiropractor's and never dreamed I could have that experience at home. I love my new turbo platform! It's absolutely addicting!
customer_reviews.author: CMo

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality product
customer_reviews.text: I am getting a good workout. I do 1.5 miles on the treadmill, 10 minutes on plate, then back on tread mill, on the plate again . I also feel that it benefits my gut microbiome
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Feelin the Vibe
customer_reviews.text: The Lifepro Turbo Platform is an awesome new addition to my morning routine. I use it in the morning to improve circulation and loosen my muscles. By just doing controlled breathing on it I feel more energized and focused to start my day. I am looking forward to incorporating it in strength building exercises soon.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Movsesian

customer_reviews.title: fun and energizing
customer_reviews.text: i feel energized and i get good blood flow through my whole body. i will see what my results are when i pass the 30 day mark.
customer_reviews.author: mike ramazetti

product_meta.title: LifePro Turbo 3D Vibration Plate Exercise Machine - Dual Motor Oscillation, Pulsation + 3D Motion Vibration Platform | Full Whole Body Vibration Machine for Home Fitness & Weight Loss.
feature_bullets: FOR HELPFUL, BLISSFUL PAIN RELIEF - Whether you’re fighting lower back pain, aching knees, or arthritic joints, stepping on The Turbo vibration plate will give you immediate and noticeable relief. Much like rubbing a bumped shin or shaking an injured finger, the exercise machine stimulates your nerves, blocking out pain, relieving built-up tension and soothing your joints as your brain focuses on motion, not pain.

ALLEVIATE CHRONIC PAIN:- If you live with chronic pain, most likely you’ve learned to bury it beneath a regular regimen of painkillers. But what if you could fix the underlying issue? The Turbo delivers efficient and gentle Whole Body Vibration (WBV), to help relieve chronic pain, heal old damage, and accelerate recovery from acute injuries.

REGAIN STRENGTH, FLEXIBILITY & RANGE OF MOTION: Regain muscle tone, strengthen bone density, boost your metabolism and more with the LifePro Turbo. Gentle, therapeutic vibrations wake up muscles throughout your body, improving circulation and triggering myofascial release. This, in turn, enhances your body’s built-in ability to regenerate cells and repair itself - increasing motion, flexibility and comfort from the very first session.

DOUBLE THE MOTORS, TRIPLE THE MOTION: An upgraded version of our standard Waver model, we built our Turbo with 2 robust motors for a 3D range of motion, specifically to provide even greater pain relief with its pulsating motion. Depending on the pain you’re experiencing, or your recovery goals, you can choose to use 1, 2 or both in tandem.

LIFETIME GUARANTEE & GUIDANCE: When you purchase one of our whole body vibration machine it comes with a complete system of support, including built-in LIVE support from our ‘guiding angels’ and free access to a comprehensive library of training videos and tools. Additionally, every platform bearing our name undergoes rigorous scrutiny to make sure it delivers on power and efficacy and a built-in lifetime warranty so you’re never left hanging.
